about.me: Blockchain Enthusiast | Professional IT Service Provider | Stake Pool Operator | Always looking to improve processes and help the Cardano community. I have been in the IT field for 15 years, and specialize in Server Infrastructure, Disaster Recovery and Cyber Security
about.server: Security first, on-site servers in Edmonton, Alberta. Canada. Multi-Site redundancy and replication for fast disaster recovery. 2x AMD EPYC 8 Core servers 128GB RAM Primary, 64GB RAM Secondary, NVMe SSDs, Gigabit Fibre link with Failover internet. Server-grade EATON Lithium UPS units protecting the network racks. Also running a Japanese node in the Saitama Azure Cloud for geo-redundancy.
